data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
python: pin version for compatibility (#60)

* add python to dependabot checks

* specify upper bounds for pip dependencies

* add optional dataloader tests, and add a workflow to install and test

* improve the testing a bit

* remove the ament cmake find outside of a ros build, as that causes issues on cursed ros setups

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message: python: data loader improvements and raw loader overhaul (#56)

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
docs: overhaul and add a github pages workflow (#55)

essentially a massive overhaul to everything documentation related. we now use rosdocs2, sphinx, doxygen to build docs. and gh-pages-action to deploy to github-pages automatically

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
Fix builds when fetching is not possible (#54)

* just force include bonxai code instead of the madness i had before

* remove the fetch content flag from colcon.pkg

* clean up bonxai finding and mocking a bit

* drop cmake min version to 3.22.0

* make fPIC a property target ON instead of the global build flag

* update changelog for v0.1.6

* v0.1.6

* add ros build workflows with and without rosdep

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
v0.1.5 - humble release ready (#53)

* changelog

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
Drop cmake min version to 3.22.1 to support ros humble builds with default toolchains  (#52)

* mock a find package file if cmake below version 3.24

* different sophus version compat for older cmake

* add compat target sources for cmake < 3.23

* missing include fix

* cmake policy to suppress warning on the older cmake

* fix the bonxai fetch problem for ubuntu 22.04 isolated builds

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message: Bump version 0.1.4 (#51)

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
Drop ros cmake min version to 3.26.5.  (#50)

Conditional fetchcontent flags to include exclude_from_all only if version > 3.28. Should fix rhel 9 builds for ros

data.message: Add a bump fetchcontent workflow/action (#48)

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
v0.1.3 (#46)

* update changelog

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
temp: fix ros builds when FETCHCONTENT_FULLY_DISABLE is ON, aka the ros build farm (#45)

* clean up ament target dependencies deprecation

* update bonxai version

* add bonxai core source to dependencies/bonxai with a check to include only on specific conditions

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
Change package layout to make ros package release easier (#44)

* move ros/cmake and package xml out. merge core cmake into root cmake

this is basically the lesser evil of the two options i thought up to
make the package build on the ros build farm. the other was to patch the
release repository to manually copy the cpp source files (scripted) as a
patch onto upstream. horrible either way.

* build ros by default, but disable it for the python build. if someone
does a cpp build then they'll have to manually disable it

* the makefile recipe now disables ros build by default for cpp only
build. at least

* clean up ros workflows a bit

data.author: Tianyi Lim
data.message: Add self qualifer to __iter__ function (#39)

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
fix (core): in case map is empty, correct lidar frame timestamping

second frame timestamp after the first is now correct.

the first frame which is used as global frame is also logged in the trajectory dump with an identity pose.

python cli run_name has a better default value by taking the name of the data itself.

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
python: prettier logs using rich (#36)

plus some fixes to the actual log content

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
Drop irregular lidar frames (#35)

* throw an exception when the lidar stamp has too big of a delta

* use invalid argument. and try catch in both ros and python sides

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
fix the component registration so it shows up ros2 component types (#34)

for the online node component

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
Switch python dataloaders to a sequential iterator style (#31)

* switch out more raise exceptions to normal error printing and exit

* fix issue #30 by switching to iterator style on the dataloader

* change helipr reader to follow the iterator style. plus fix some errors with parsing extrinsics

* change raw dataloader to iterator style. note that raw has not been tested yet

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
Update bug_report.md issue template

simplify the issue template a bit

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
Fix logic error in offline node (ros) and interval imu stats compute (core) (#29)

* cleaner error messages and log parsed imu and lidar frames for ros

* patch rviz config to change the global frame if a different odom frame is used

* revert offline node bag and buffer completion handling logic

* cannot compute accel mag variance if imu count is 1. modify the check preventing divide by 0 errors

* remove python/config/default.yaml since --dump_config does the same job

* bump version to v0.1.1 and update python readme slightly

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
fix: ros launch - correctly overload config file params with cli params (#28)

* fix: ros launch - correctly overload config file params with cli params

* clarify that the default.yaml config file is not automatically picked up by the ros launch file

* add a check to make sure 0 or both extrinsics are specified

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
Add a bug report issue template (#27)

* Add a bug report issue template

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
Update docs to specify more details on data format (#25)

* print the extrinsics to console after guessing them, so that its easier for the user to respecify in a config if required

* add a data.md that specifies the minimal requirements on data we have.

* add a readme section for all the configurations rko lio has been tested on

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
Update defaults to provide an easier entry into using the system (#24)

* set initialization_phase to false by default, as a false start can break odometry. the user can opt-in to initializing if they know their system starts from rest.

* remove Ninja as the default generator for ROS builds, as it breaks ros build farm builds

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
Bump version 0.1.0 (#22)

* Update pyproject.toml to v0.1.0

* Update package.xml to version 0.1.0

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message: update readme for multiplatform demo (#21)

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
Ros API improvements (#20)

* append quat_xyzw_xyz to extrinsic parameter names to make the order clearer

* rename bag_filename to bag_path to be more intuitive on the offline node

* ros refactoring: more parameter definitions, better parameter defaults, better variable names, offline node simplifications, and readme and launfile updates to reflect the new parameter names.

* update the rviz config file

* launchfile is improved. cli params override config files. final config is printed to console

* update the documentation to reflect the changes

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
Better error messages and add odometry demo video to readme (#19)

* better error printing when there are no corresponding frames in TF for a
message frame ids

* add a video link to youtube platform demo

Remove scipy as a dependency for the python side (#16)

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
Readme simplification (#15)

* more details to the python side

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
C++ simplifications, py-rosbag reader improvements (#14)

* print the names of the bag files being added if there are multiple

* add a --dump_config option to get a default config out

* improve the --help messages a bit

* print a more helpful message in case the bag doesnt contain a tf

* simplifications on the cpp side to how we compute interval stats for imu

* better handle the case when there are no timestamps in the point cloud
for a rosbag

* change the names of a few variables

* add some more details to the main readme

* bump version

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
Improve README for immedite clarity on how to use (#13)

* add a clarification for incomplete bags just in case

data.author: Meher Malladi

Add a ros rolling CI build (#12)

* add ros rolling build to the ci

* add a rolling badge for ros

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
version print for python cli, workflow to ensure py and ros versions match (#11)

simple cli modification. additional workflow.

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
Fix/improve rerun visualization, remove matplotlib as an undocumented dep, bump version (#10)

* remove unnecessary dependency on matplotlib. also prevents a break

* use the rerun blueprint from the visualization we have now

* move rerun config to the package folder, and then always log it on
initialization

so we get a well configured viz by default

* improve docs a bit, and change the name for a workflow build

* bump version because we fixed the visualization in this one

data.author: Meher Malladi
data.message:
Add humble support and improve workflows (#9)

* fix the problem with bag timestamp on humble

* use my humble image for humble build

* add details for humble in readmes. switch workflows branch back to
master

* split workflows into reusable workflows, so that i get badges on the
readme

* finish the quest for pretty status badges

data.author: Meher Malladi

Add macOS and Windows support/builds/wheels (#8)

* builds on mac arm (14 and 15)

* builds on windows 2022

* fix the msvc build error on helipr

* added in tests

* use pytests in the python bindings workflow

* drop support for py 3.9

* we provide wheels for all major platforms now

* except windows 11 arm

* version bump to 0.0.2

time to pray this works
